index.description: The name of the follower index

wait_for_active_shards.description: Sets the number of shard copies that must be active before returning. Defaults to 0. Set to `all` for all shard copies, otherwise set to any non-negative value less than or equal to the total number of copies for the shard (number of replicas + 1)

master_timeout.description: Explicit operation timeout for connection to master node

body.description: The name of the leader index and other optional ccr related parameters
